entry.value: {'P68431': {'name': 'H31_HUMAN Histone H3.1 OS=Homo sapiens GN=HIST1H3A PE=1 SV=2', 'sequence': 'MARTKQTARKSTGGKAPRKQLATKAARKSAPATGGVKKPHRYRPGTVALREIRRYQKSTELLIRKLPFQRLVREIAQDFKTDLRFQSSAVMALQEACEAYLVGLFEDTNLCAIHAKRVTIMPKDIQLARRIRGERA', 'enabled_sequences': ''}, 'P84243': {'name': 'H31_HUMAN Histone H3.1 OS=Homo sapiens GN=HIST1H3A PE=1 SV=2', 'sequence': 'MARTKQTARKSTGGKAPRKQLATKAARKSAPATGGVKKPHRYRPGTVALREIRRYQKSTELLIRKLPFQRLVREIAQDFKTDLRFQSSAVMALQEACEAYLVGLFEDTNLCAIHAKRVTIMPKDIQLARRIRGERA', 'enabled_sequences': ''}, 'Q71DI3': {'name': 'H31_HUMAN Histone H3.1 OS=Homo sapiens GN=HIST1H3A PE=1 SV=2', 'sequence': 'MARTKQTARKSTGGKAPRKQLATKAARKSAPATGGVKKPHRYRPGTVALREIRRYQKSTELLIRKLPFQRLVREIAQDFKTDLRFQSSAVMALQEACEAYLVGLFEDTNLCAIHAKRVTIMPKDIQLARRIRGERA', 'enabled_sequences': ''}, 'Q16695': {'name': 'H31_HUMAN Histone H3.1 OS=Homo sapiens GN=HIST1H3A PE=1 SV=2', 'sequence': 'MARTKQTARKSTGGKAPRKQLATKAARKSAPATGGVKKPHRYRPGTVALREIRRYQKSTELLIRKLPFQRLVREIAQDFKTDLRFQSSAVMALQEACEAYLVGLFEDTNLCAIHAKRVTIMPKDIQLARRIRGERA', 'enabled_sequences': ''}, 'P62805': {'name': 'H31_HUMAN Histone H3.1 OS=Homo sapiens GN=HIST1H3A PE=1 SV=2', 'sequence': 'MARTKQTARKSTGGKAPRKQLATKAARKSAPATGGVKKPHRYRPGTVALREIRRYQKSTELLIRKLPFQRLVREIAQDFKTDLRFQSSAVMALQEACEAYLVGLFEDTNLCAIHAKRVTIMPKDIQLARRIRGERA', 'enabled_sequences': ''}}

library(dplyr)%%00010%%00010fasta_input <- knime.in$'Column0' |> as.character()%%00010%%00010# indices of all FASTA headers%%00010i <- which(substring(fasta_input, 1,1) == '>')%%00010headers <- fasta_input[i]%%00010%%00010# parse FASTA sequences%%00010i_start <- i+1%%00010%%00010i_end <- c(i[-1], length(fasta_input)+1)%%00010i_end <- i_end-1%%00010%%00010sequences <- character()%%00010%%00010for (j in 1:length(i)){%%00010%%00009seq <- paste(fasta_input[i_start[j]:i_end[j]], collapse = '')%%00010%%00009sequences[length(sequences)+1] <- seq%%00010}%%00010%%00010# create output df%%00010out_df <- data.frame(Header = headers, Sequence = sequences)%%00010out_df$Accession <- unname(sapply(out_df$Header, function(x) {%%00010%%00009split <- unlist(unname(strsplit(x, '|', fixed = TRUE)))%%00010%%00009return(split[2])%%00010}))%%00010out_df$Name <- unname(sapply(out_df$Header, function(x) {%%00010%%00009split <- unlist(unname(strsplit(x, '|', fixed = TRUE)))%%00010%%00009return(split[3])%%00010}))%%00010%%00010# create string to be parsed as Python dictionary%%00010out_df <- out_df |>%%00010%%00009mutate(String = paste0("{'name': '", Name, "', 'sequence': '", Sequence, "', 'enabled_sequences': ''}"))%%00010%%00010dict_string <- character()%%00010%%00010for (k in 1:nrow(out_df)){%%00010%%00009temp <- paste0("'", out_df$Accession[k], "': ", out_df$String)%%00010%%00009dict_string[length(dict_string)+1] <- temp%%00010}%%00010%%00010dict_string_full <- paste0('{', paste(dict_string, collapse = ', '), '}')%%00010%%00010accessions <- paste(out_df$Accession, collapse = ';')%%00010sequences <- paste(out_df$Sequence, collapse = ';')%%00010%%00010knime.flow.out <- list(fasta_dict = dict_string_full, %%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009 fasta_accession = accessions,%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009 fasta_seq = sequences)%%00010knime.out <- out_df

entry.key: Output non numbers (NaN, Inf, -Inf) as missing cells
